xmlns="http://www.sitemaps.org/schemas/sitemap/0.9" xmlns="http://www.google.com/schemas/sitemap-image/1.1" xmlns:video="http://www.google.com/schemas/sitemap-video/1.1">
https://tmrev.io/movie/492974-Bon week-end Monsieur Bennett ! 2022-11-27
https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/fVh2mTKRiFOwuB4HUsQwjiSOzmi.jpg Mr. Bennett is a model citizen, a tender father and an irreproachable husband, he yearns for a quiet life. On a weekend he receives a visit from a strange man called Pédro Juarez. Mr. Bennett’s past suddenly resurfaces and his peaceful existence is turned upside down ... Bon week-end Monsieur Bennett !
